name: Anime Tournament HD: Reborn
description:
Hey guys, here it is. The Stand-alone DLC for Anime Tournament HD. If you don't know what a Mugen is, it's 2D Fighting Game. It has 86 characters with 4 different boss battles and 11 mini-games also there are 32 stages. You can use a Controller if so desire and even Play With or Against Your Friend with local-co-op. Almost all these characters are from popular anime such as Naruto, Dragon Ball Z/Super, Bleach, One Piece, Fairy Tale and more! Some characters are harder to play than others but once you learn how to use them they can be very powerful. Sorry about the game size guys it's about 2 GB Download. Feel free to add or remove characters and or stages to your liking.

If there is anything such as bugs or you think any characters should be buffed or nerfed let me know through...

Twitter - @LegendaryXP117
YouTube - LegendaryXP
Or leave a comment here.

Requirements
  • A 16:9 Aspect Ratio monitor
  • 720p or higher resolution screen
  • Windows XP or Higher
  • Can run well on just about anything
Install

Once zip file is open just extract the folder somewhere and run Anime Tournament HD Reborn.exe in the data folder.

If you want some help with the controls, there is a guide folder inside the Anime Tournament data folder. There you will find .txt files on how to play. To run the game be sure to use "Anime Tournament HD Reborn.exe".

Controls
Menu
  • Arrows Keys to Navigate through Menus
  • Q, E, R, A, S, D, F are Select buttons on the Menu
  • ESC is the Back button on the Menu

Fullscreen - (Left) Alt + Enter

In-Game
  • Arrows Keys to Move character
  • Q, E, R, A, S, D to Attack (Can vary with different characters)
  • F to Power Up (For Most Characters) if not F for a Dragon-ball Z character try A + S
  • Down Arrow + Q, E, R, A, S, D activates Super Attack (For Most Characters)
  • Pause/Break Key Pauses the game
  • Walk Backward from your Opponent to Block
  • ESC allows you to Back Out Of The Match
  • When you Lose in Arcade Mode pressing Q, E, R, A, S, D, F lets you pick a different character and Try Again on the same match.

If you want to play Versus with an AI simply select characters you want with Player 1 controls then Player 2 controls then, while In-Game press Left CTRL + 2 (Not NumPad)

DownloadDownload Anime Tournament HD Reborn.zipCredits
